alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Cobb; DeKalb; Douglas; Gwinnett; North Fulton; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 8:36PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western DeKalb, Cobb, central Douglas, southwestern Gwinnett, Fulton and northwestern Clayton Counties through 915 PM EST... At 836 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Fair Oaks to near Roscoe, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, Douglasville, Decatur, Jonesboro, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Johns Creek, Alpharetta, Smyrna, Dunwoody, East Point, Kennesaw, Duluth, Union City, Forest Park, Suwanee, Riverdale, College Park and Powder Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; Cobb; DeKalb; Douglas; Gwinnett; North Fulton; South Fulton
